attrs.name: cache
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to enable the user data cache function. The default value is true.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: cache-key
attrs.desc: The default value of the customized cache key is tiny-user
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is tiny-user.

attrs.name: value-split
attrs.desc: Separator for displaying multiple texts in the text box. The default value is semicolon (;). Set the separator when multiple texts are displayed in the text box. The default value is, comma (,)
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is,

attrs.name: value-field
attrs.desc: Field name of the data source corresponding to the value in the drop-down list box.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is userId.

attrs.name: text-split
attrs.desc: Separator for displaying multiple texts in the text box when multiple texts are selected.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is,

attrs.name: text-field
attrs.desc: Set the field name of the data source corresponding to the text in the drop-down list box.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is userCN.

attrs.name: fetchUser
attrs.desc: Configure the function of querying user information by area code (displayed on the card).

attrs.name: fetchW3Accounts
attrs.desc: Customize the user information batch query service

attrs.name: getUserImageUrl
attrs.desc: Customized configuration for obtaining user avatars
